characters.name: Minion Doll
characters.description: Killing this doll is how you get the third key to save your friend

characters.name: Freddy Krueger
characters.description: Level 1: Freddy Krueger - "One, two, Freddy's coming for you", Freddy has a burned disfigured face, dirty striped clothing and a brown fedora, beware of his bladed leather glove on his right hand.

characters.name: Ghostface
characters.description: Level 2: Ghostface - "if you want to be in a hospital, I'd be happy to put you there..."

characters.name: Pennywise
characters.description: Level 3: Pennywise - "Tasty, tasty, beautiful fear", beware of Pennywise, but don't be sacred, he feeds on fear.

characters.name: Micheal Myers
characters.description: Level 4: Micheal Myers - "Turn around..." - you can run but you can't hide.

characters.name: Shreck
characters.description: Level 5: Shreck - "GET OUT OF ME SWAMP!!!"

characters.name: Boss Doll
characters.description: FINAL LEVEL: The Doll - Your whole journey has led to this, good luck.
